Package uk.ac.liv.auction.config

Classes for running a batch of different auctions with each for a certain number of iterations

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Case Defines the interface of how a value case of an auction property is applied.
ParameterBasedCase A value case of an auction property that can be initialized with a string argument.
 

Class Summary
CaseEnum A resettable enumeration.
CaseEnumConfig The class initializing a set of different auction settings - a combination of properties each taking one or more values.
GroupSize Defines the unit size of agents participating an auction, together with Ratio, determining the populations of each type of agents.
IntervalCaseEnum A type of CaseEnum that can automatically generate a list of value cases of an auction property based on the specified value range.
NPricingPolicyCase Defines the number of the latest successful shout pairs used to determine the next clearing price
ParameterBasedCaseEnum A type of CaseEnum that can automatically generate a list of value cases of an auction property.
ParameterBasedCaseImpl  
Ratio Defines the relative ratio of the populations of different agents.
Schedule Defines the schedule of a type of agents, i.e.
Strategy Defines the strategy used by the specified agent group.
StrategyCombo A shortcut to define strategies each for one agent group.
 

Package uk.ac.liv.auction.config Description

Classes for running a batch of different auctions with each for a certain number of iterations
